name: Cape's Escape Game 3rd Room
storyline: Looks like the main character is heading home from a date with Todomi. He got passionately beaten up by Todomi so he’s on cloud nine. He’s a little thirsty so he stops by at a convenience store called Labor Loss. Is it really legit? Sure enough, the main character finds himself in a super weird convenience store. He gets trapped inside as usual by Cape. Solve riddles to help the main character escape.
summary: Cape's Escape Game 3rd Room is a short adventure game in the Cape's Escape series, which you can complete in an hour or so. Solve the mystery and escape from the room. Once you manage to escape from the convenience store, you'll be able to take the game for a new spin with some new puzzles as you search for a set of hidden cards.
